Last Published: 29 Oct 2013  | Version: 1.0.0-alpha5
Maven 2
Parent Project
  • Maven Plugin for Play! Framework 2.x
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

play2:testCompile

Full name:

com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin:play2-maven-plugin:1.0.0-alpha5:testCompile

Description:

Compile Scala and Java test sources

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Since version: 1.0.0.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
javacOptions String 1.0.0 Additional parameters for Java compiler.
Default value is: -g.
User property is: play.javacOptions.
sbtVersion String 1.0.0 ...
User property is: play.sbtVersion.
scalacOptions String 1.0.0 Additional parameters for Scala compiler.
Default value is: -deprecation -unchecked.
User property is: play.scalacOptions.
sourceEncoding String 1.0.0 The -encoding argument for Scala and Java compilers.
User property is: project.build.sourceEncoding.
testCompileSkip boolean 1.0.0 Set this to 'true' to bypass compilation of test sources. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
User property is: maven.test.skip.

Parameter Details

javacOptions:

Additional parameters for Java compiler.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.javacOptions
  • Default: -g

sbtVersion:

...
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.sbtVersion

scalacOptions:

Additional parameters for Scala compiler.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: play.scalacOptions
  • Default: -deprecation -unchecked

sourceEncoding:

The -encoding argument for Scala and Java compilers.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: project.build.sourceEncoding

testCompileSkip:

Set this to 'true' to bypass compilation of test sources. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.test.skip
